comment.body: well, keep this up for another few weeks and I'd agree. I generally only check ZN once a day, and not if at all if I have a particularly busy day. But there's an active community here. Welcome :-)
They'll just make ZN illegal at that point, but it's still worth a try.
It always surprises me how many Hitler brands exist in the east, there's Hitler Ice Cream, Hitler Beer, Hitler Lemonade. Do they even know who that is? Is it a weird marketing strategy?

@Quantumworld: obvious joke is obvious, stop being a bore. Not everything needs to become a safe space. It's in part the banning of edgy humor that's driving people away from clearnet, or at least the silicon valley giants.
Oh, he cares. About himself. He's not going to do anything because he wants to get re-elected. Solving issues isn't one of those things that will get him re-elected.
